document_data.name: Megthanet
document_data.mainbody:
'''Megthanet''' was a middle-class inhabitant of the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|''You eaten at the Elfsong before? Awful, just awful. Had a stew there once that looked like it had a finger in it.''|Megthanet}}
document_data.Description: Megthanet was a [[gold dwarven]] woman with a clean-shaved face. She had dark bronze skin, brown eyes, and strawberry-brown hair. Her hair was tightly gathered into a bun and her clothes included a fine-quality jacket.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, as the [[Cult of the Absolute]] menaced the city of Baldur's Gate, Megthanet could be found in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]], gossiping with her [[gnome|gnomish]] friend, [[Hilario Varota]]. Megthanet expressed her disgust with the food at a local eatery, the [[Elfsong]] tavern, and claimed that Duke [[Belynne Stelmane]], who was murdered in the Elfsong, had her guts displayed in the symbol of the [[Absolute]].
